name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tic Tac Toe Online Free Game

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Try your luck against 12 animated opponents in this completely free Tic Tac Toe game that players of all ages know and love.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,f:
Try your luck against 12 animated opponents in this completely free Tic Tac Toe game that players of all ages know and love.

Tic Tac Toe - the classic game of naughts and crosses. Enjoy an online version of Tic-tac-toe with your friends! This game has stood the test of time and remains a popular title due to its simple gameplay and fun strategy. If you enjoy traditional board games then you will love playing this online version.

how to play
Choose your opponent
Press a square to place your mark
Make three in a row horizontally, vertically, or diagonally to win
Watch your opponent and block them if they get 2 in a row
Try a harder mode to keep it interesting
Turn off sounds using the top right menu
Use the top left menu to reset your scores for the current opponent
